controls:
Police Traffic is an online 3D game to experience driving in heavy traffic while being a police officer.

You can speed up but be careful of the other cars that might stop suddenly.

Get ready to become a master of speedy overtakes and tight turns. Escape from dangerous situations and collect money on the road without crashing your car.

Before starting the game, you need to choose the police car. Each car has a different power of speed, handling and brake. 

Game Modes

There are 4 modes of Police Traffic: 

One-Way Mode: Enjoy a more relaxed one way road. Nothing is upcoming to you.

Two-Way Mode: We added a little spice to One-Way and created Two-Way Mode for you to feel the adrenaline rush. Speed between cars going opposite directions. Earn combo and wrong-way points. 

Time Attack Mode: Try if you can survive through the road until the time is up.

Speed bomb: Time to be a bus driver. A bomb is activated and will explode if you slow down. You can crash over smaller vehicles at the cost of bomb health. But, better to stay away from trucks and buses. Any crash with bigger vehicles will slow you down. Bomb health rapidly drops in that case.

description: Solitaire Adventure is a Tripeaks Solitaire game for everyone.  There are ten islands with tripeaks puzzles waiting to be solved.  Start with Bella's Island; she will guide you through this adventure.  Collect cards and clear all the boards.

title: Rescue Helicopter
description: Are you ready to be a hero?  People trapped on the roof need you!  You are the only one who can operate the helicopter and have to save them with the helicopter's rope.  Rescue Helicopter is a 2D helicopter game where you drive a helicopter and rescue people.
controls: Direct the helicopter by clicking your mouse and take people needing rescue to the helicopter.
controls_text: Direct the helicopter by clicking your mouse and take people needing rescue to the helicopter.

title: Funny Shooter Bro
description:
Funny Shooter Bro is a web-based FPS game with funny-looking enemies and bizarre sound effects.  
Spawn onto the map alone with your trusty weapon.  All redmen hates strangers in this town.  They will not hold back from running over you with sticks when they spot you.
controls:

  • Look Around: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left-Click
  • Aim: Right-Click

  • Throw a Grenade: G
  • Run: Left Shift

title: Among Impostor
description: Among Impostor is an exciting web browser game inspired by the popular multiplayer deception game Among Us.  In this thrilling experience, you will be part of a crew.  All the crewmates are busy diligently completing their tasks.  But here is the twist: someone is there to kick it up a notch.

title: Cross the Road
description: Help the adorable frog cross the path!  Cross The Road is a 3D arcade game inspired by Crossy Road.  In the game, you guide a green frog on a vast dirt road.  While trying to cross it to the other side of the path, you will encounter many obstacles.
controls:
Desktops and Laptops

Mobile Devices

title: Owl and Rabbit Fashion
description: You've probably heard of styling a bride and dressing a pet before.  But have you ever been an owl and bunny stylist?  Owl and Rabbit Fashion is a dress-up game where your role is a fashion consultant to owls and rabbits.  They trust your taste.
controls: • To dress up your owl and rabbit, use your mouse.
controls_text: To dress up your owl and rabbit, use your mouse.

title: Treasure Hunter
description: The tomb is filled with giant chests and treasures, each promising incredible wealth.  Enter the chamber and hunt for every single one.  But wait, what’s that?  Something is lurking in the shadows?

title: Tank Racing
description: Welcome to Tank Racing!  Tank Racing is a 2D driving game where you steer a tank on tough roads with abrupt ups and downs in a military area.  The road will be a little challenging.  You will see coins along the way.
controls:
• Use the left and right arrow keys to move the tank.
  • Use the up arrow key or the space key to jump the tank.
  • Alternatively, you can use A and D keys to move the tank and use the W key to jump it.

title: Egg Helix
description: Egg Helix is an arcade game where you steer a trunk adorned with many tennis rackets.  There will be an easter egg bouncing up and down.  Your main purpose is to take this egg to the top.  Make eggcelent steering movements to achieve it.
controls:
• Use the A/D or the Left and Right arrow keys to steer the trunk.
  • Alternatively, you may use your mouse to direct the trunk.

title: Monster Truck Racing
description:
Giant wheels and incredible engine power—Monster Trucks are amazing machines built for high performance on rough terrains.  In this mini-game, players race to the finish line with monster trucks on an obstacle course.  Drive your truck, perform jumps and flips, and be the first to reach the flag. 
Monster Truck Racing is a 2D single-player racing game where you'll strive to outpace opponents on steep tracks.
controls:
Desktop

  • Move forward: D or right arrow
  • Move backward: A or left arrow
  • Jump: W or up arrow

Mobiles

  • Move forward: Tap on the gas pedal button on the bottom right corner
  • Move backward: Tap on the brake pedal button on the bottom left corner
  • Jump: Tap on the jump icon in the bottom

Roads are tough, and slopes are steep.  Dropping the cargo box is bleep.

Are you ready to move forward on the tracks set above the endless sea?  Crazy Ball Adventures is a 3D arcade game where you steer a ball on challenging roads.  Just as you do in Slope, you must steer the ball cautiously on the tracks. 
Your job is to reach the finish line.

title: Hook Wars
description: Hook Wars is a 3D battle game where you need to avoid being hooked by the avatars across the river.  In the meantime, you will try to hook them and get them to your side.  Precise aiming is crucial here.  Challenge yourself to achieve the highest scores each time you try in this action game!
controls:
• To move, use the WASD or the Arrow keys.
  • To hook the avatars, use your left-click.
  • Alternatively, you can also use the space key to hook.

title: Mr Space Bullet
description:
Mr Space Bullet is a 2D shooting game where you will be on a staircase in outer space.  While trying to climb up, you will come across many aliens on your way.  Your job is to aim at your enemies precisely at their heads. 
Shoot the alien you encounter on every stair without blinking an eye.

title: Sweet Sugar Match
description: Sweet Sugar Match is a 2D puzzle game where you try to match sweet candies of the same color.  Swipe the candies to create a series of 3 or more matching colorful sugars.  When you match them, that series of blocks disappears, and the blocks on top come down.  Match the candies just like you did in Candy Crush!
controls: • Use your mouse and swipe the candies.
controls_text: Use your mouse and swipe the candies.

title: Draw the Bird Path
description: Draw The Bird Path is a drawing game where the player tries to guide sweet birds home by drawing paths.  Help the birds find their nests.  Create a path for them by overcoming obstacles and objects.  But be careful when guiding more than one bird to their home; they should not collide with each other.
controls: • Swipe the birds to their nests with your mouse.
controls_text: Swipe the birds to their nests with your mouse.

title: Jackpot Casino
description: Jackpot Casino is a free slot game where your main aim is to line up the same symbols on the slot machine side by side to claim your prize.  You will see that the machine is adorned with many symbols.  Spin the reels and try to get at least three identical tokens shoulder-to-shoulder.  Hit the jackpot in this exciting kids game!
controls: • Left mouse click: To spin the machine
